description: Square array A(n,k) = (n / prime(1+A084558(k))^e) * prime(1+A084558(k)-A099563(k))^e, where e = A249344((1+A084558(k)), n) = the exponent of the largest power of prime(1+A084558(k)) which divides n. Array is read by descending antidiagonals as A(1,1), A(1,2), A(2,1), A(1,3), A(2,2), A(3,1), etc.
